title: Local Hour: Jeffrey Dahmer Was A Bad Guy
description:
David Samson joins us to discuss Aaron Judge's 61st HR, Giancarlo Stanton and body paint, Marlins baseball, and the new Armie Hammer documentary. Then, we prepare ourselves for Dolphins-Bengals on TNF, discuss the damage of Hurricane Ian, and find out some news...Jeffrey Dahmer? Bad guy.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
